# UIWindowScene.DismissalAnimation.standard

**Case**

The standard dismissal animations.

## Declaration

```swift
case standard
```

## Discussion

Use this type of animation when you want the system to perform a standard dismissal animation. For example, you might use this animation to close a scene displaying a web page.

## Animation styles

- **UIWindowScene.DismissalAnimation.commit**: Animations to use when saving changes.
- **UIWindowScene.DismissalAnimation.decline**: Animations to use when declining changes.
